plot: With his father out of action, Mark struggles to defend the city against an interdimensional invasion, joining forces with a team of teenage superheroes.

While Omni-Man incapacitated after the attack on the Guardians, Invincible joins forces with the Teen Team to repel invasions by the alien Flaxans. the Flaxans prove adaptive to the Team, and it is up to a veteran superhero to save the day.—Gislef
